argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | znvalOLD.z | |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) |
| 2 |  | znvalOLD.s | |- S = ( RSpan ` Z ) |
| 3 |  | znvalOLD.u | |- U = ( Z /s ( Z ~QG ( S ` { N } ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cncrng | |- CCfld e. CRing |
| 5 |  | #P_zsubrg | |- ZZ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_subrgcrng | |- ( ( CCfld e. CRing /\ ZZ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> Z e. CRing ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_mp2an | |- Z e. CRing |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_znlidlOLD | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( S ` { N } ) e. ( LIdeal ` Z ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LIdeal ` Z ) = ( LIdeal ` Z ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_quscrng | |- ( ( Z e. CRing /\ ( S ` { N } ) e. ( LIdeal ` Z ) ) -> U e. CRing ) |
| 11 | 7, 8, 10 | #P_sylancr | |- ( N e. ZZ -> U e. CRing ) |
